BUSINESS REQUIREMENTS DOCUMENT.pdf.Details:
Deploy a unified change management tool to streamline, track, and control project-related changes
across all departments within the bank, ensuring regulatory compliance, transparency, and
operational efficiency.
Executive
Summary
The bank currently faces fragmented change management processes, leading to delays, inconsistent
approvals, and audit challenges. This project aims to implement a centralized digital tool accessible to
all departments, automating workflows, enhancing traceability, and supporting compliance. The tool
will improve project delivery speed, reduce risks, and provide a single source of truth for change
activities.

- Project Management Office (PMO)
- IT Department
- Operations
- Compliance & Risk
- Audit
- Department Heads
- End Users (all departments)
- External Regulators
Functional
Requirements
- Role-based access control for users and approvers
- Centralized change request submission and tracking
- Automated workflow for approvals and notifications
- Comprehensive audit trail and reporting
- Integration with existing project management and documentation systems
- Customizable templates for different change types
- Real-time dashboards and analytics

- Must comply with banking regulations (e.g., SOX, GDPR)
- Integration limited to current IT infrastructure
- User adoption and training within tight timelines
- Data residency requirements

- Software Licensing: $450,000
- Implementation & Integration: $180,000
- Training: $75,000
- Contingency: $50,000
Total: $755,000

1. Discovery & Requirements Gathering
2. Solution Selection & Procurement
3. Design & Integration
4. Pilot Implementation (select departments)
5. Full Deployment
6. Training & Change Management
7. Project Review & Closure
